name: @animoca/ethereum-contracts-assets_inventory
description: Solidity assets contracts managing fungible and non-fungible tokens
author: Animoca Brands

scripts.coverage:ERC1155Inventory: hardhat coverage --show-stack-traces --testfiles test/contracts/token/ERC1155/ERC1155InventoryMock.test.js && rm -rf coverage_ERC1155InventoryMock && mv coverage coverage_ERC1155InventoryMock
scripts.coverage:ERC1155InventoryBurnable: hardhat coverage --show-stack-traces --testfiles test/contracts/token/ERC1155/ERC1155InventoryBurnableMock.test.js && rm -rf coverage_ERC1155InventoryBurnableMock && mv coverage coverage_ERC1155InventoryBurnableMock
scripts.coverage:ERC1155InventoryPausable: hardhat coverage --show-stack-traces --testfiles test/contracts/token/ERC1155/ERC1155InventoryPausableMock.test.js && rm -rf coverage_ERC1155InventoryPausableMock && mv coverage coverage_ERC1155InventoryPausableMock
scripts.coverage:ERC1155721Inventory: hardhat coverage --show-stack-traces --testfiles test/contracts/token/ERC1155721/ERC1155721InventoryMock.test.js && rm -rf coverage_ERC1155721InventoryMock && mv coverage coverage_ERC1155721InventoryMock
scripts.coverage:ERC1155721InventoryBurnable: hardhat coverage --show-stack-traces --testfiles test/contracts/token/ERC1155721/ERC1155721InventoryBurnableMock.test.js && rm -rf coverage_ERC1155721InventoryBurnableMock && mv coverage coverage_ERC1155721InventoryBurnableMock
scripts.coverage:ERC1155721InventoryPausable: hardhat coverage --show-stack-traces --testfiles test/contracts/token/ERC1155721/ERC1155721InventoryPausableMock.test.js && rm -rf coverage_ERC1155721InventoryPausableMock && mv coverage coverage_ERC1155721InventoryPausableMock
scripts.coverage: run-s coverage:ERC1155Inventory coverage:ERC1155InventoryBurnable coverage:ERC1155InventoryPausable coverage:ERC1155721Inventory coverage:ERC1155721InventoryBurnable coverage:ERC1155721InventoryPausable
scripts.gas-report: wait-on tcp:8545 && cross-env REPORT_GAS=true hardhat --network localhost test --show-stack-traces
scripts.clean: run-p clean:compile clean:flatten clean:smartcheck clean:coverage clean:doc
scripts.make:coffee: run-s format fix compile flatten smartcheck test coverage doc
